TopicTitle: Any mods that have a gold foiled cube shaped probe cores?

Articles.Content: Im looking for a generic probe body that has gold foil like in the modern day probes, satellites. This needs to be much like the stock cube(generic) but covered in gold foil.  I do have raidernicks probes but those are pre-fabs based on specific missions. They will not suffice.

The probe core in the Asteroid Day pack has gold foil on it, kind of, it's hexagonal though.

I don't know of any other mods that have a probe core that looks like modern probes.
Blackleg Industries have two nice gold foil - like probe cores (one rectangular and one octagonal), along with antennae and solar panels.

2 hours ago, lextacy said:

Im looking for a generic probe body that has gold foil like in the modern day probes, satellites. This needs to be much like the stock cube(generic) but covered in gold foil.  I do have raidernicks probes but those are pre-fabs based on specific missions. They will not suffice.

RLA Stockalike has gold-foil variants of all the stock probes, including the cube one. So if you want one that's "just like the stock cube but golden", that is literally your best bet.

Fuel Tanks Plush (yes, I noticed the typo, but I liked it) have some fuel tanks in various shapes that are covered in gold foil. Not exactly a probe body, but it's a thing that you can attach to your probe, and it's covered in chocolate wrapper.
great recommendations guys ! I will sort this out tommorw. Big day coming with the launch of the Pathfinder with ballooons
AIES Aerospace also has a good selection of probe cores, including a gold foil rectangular one.
